description:
Caules Forvedge is suddenly apprehended as the perpetrator. As Lord El-Melloi II causes the Mystic Eyes Auction to pause while disclosing his deductions, Reines, who is supposedly still in London, rushes over to his side. Thus, Lord El-Melloi II points out the name of the true perpetrator.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Magan Shuushuu Ressha 6/6: Raikou to Ryuusei
Rail Zeppelin 6/6: Lightning and Shooting Star
魔眼蒐集列車6/6 雷光と流星
